name: Dhivaakar Vijayakumar
company_address: 33, Kabila Hospital, Gowripuram, Karur, Tamil Nadu, 639002
my_business:
Karur Ortho Care Hospital – Expert Orthopedic Care in the Heart of Karur
I am Dr. Dhivaakar Vijayakumar, an orthopedic surgeon and founder of Karur Ortho Care Hospital. We specialize in treating patients with joint pain, arthritis, fractures, sports injuries, and complex orthopedic conditions. Our services include:
•	Total Knee & Hip Replacement
•	Arthroscopy (keyhole surgery)
•	PRP Injections for Osteoarthritis
•	Fracture and Trauma Care
•	Spine and Pediatric Orthopedic Services
Our hospital offers advanced diagnostics, state-of-the-art operation theatre facilities, and compassionate post-operative care.
Whom We Serve:
Individuals aged 40+ with knee or joint pain, trauma patients, accident victims, and those seeking second opinions for orthopedic surgery.
Ideal Referrals:
•	Panchayat heads, family doctors, physiotherapists
•	Elderly patients with difficulty walking or chronic joint pain
•	Anyone in or near Karur needing reliable orthopedic consultation or surgery
top_product: PRP Injection for Knee Osteoarthritis – A non-surgical, regenerative treatment that helps reduce knee pain and delay joint replacement in early arthritis
ideal_referral: “My ideal referral is someone aged 40+ suffering from knee or joint pain, arthritis, fractures, or needing joint replacement surgery — especially those who live in or around Karur. I also welcome referrals from general practitioners, physiotherapists, and local leaders like panchayat heads who often guide people to trusted healthcare.”
top_problem_solved: “Severe knee pain in middle-aged and elderly patients due to osteoarthritis — we help them regain mobility and quality of life through advanced treatments like PRP therapy and total knee replacement.”
